## Description {#details}

A struct to densely store the state of an instruction after unrolling at each iteration.

This is designed to work like a tuple of &lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;, int&gt; for the purposes of hashing and lookup, but to be able to associate two boolean states with each key.

Definition at line 293 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp">LoopUnrollPass.cpp</a>.
